sentences.sContent: This allows the pair to mate properly and stops the hen from staying in the nest.
sentences.sCn: 这可以使这一对正常交配同时也阻止雌禽待在窝里。

sentences.sContent: They want the males to mate with wild females.
sentences.sCn: 他们想让这些雄性动物和野生的雌性动物交配。

synos.tran: （动物等的）[生物]交配，交尾；配套；（植物等的）杂交

words.tran: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物

trans.tranCn: （动物等的）交配，交尾；配套；（植物等的）杂交
交配；使配对；使紧密配合（mate的现在分词）
trans.tranOther: When animals mate, a male and a female have sex in order to produce young
